<<<<<<< HEAD
A full relation of two journeys, the one into the main-land of France, the other into some of the adjacent ilands performed and digested into six books / by Peter Heylyn. Full relation of two journeys Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.
[48], 424 p.
Printed by E. Cotes for Henry Seile ..., London : 1656.
"The relation of the first journey" and "The second journey" each have special t.p. Also published, in the same year, as: A survey of the estate of France, and some of the adjoyning ilands. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
A full relation of two journeys, the one into the main-land of France, the other into some of the adjacent ilands performed and digested into six books / by Peter Heylyn. Full relation of two journeys Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.
[48], 424 p.
Printed by E. Cotes for Henry Seile ..., London : 1656.
"The relation of the first journey" and "The second journey" each have special t.p. Also published, in the same year, as: A survey of the estate of France, and some of the adjoyning ilands. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
